version_description:
- Timezone db update
- Bug fixes

- Timezone db update
- Bug fixes
Device orientation fix for iOS8.1.2
Device orientation fix for iOS8.1.2

- Pull-and-swipe to next day
- Bugifx: Canadian provinces are now searchable
- Ability to upgrade locations database over the internet
- Misc fixes

- Pull-and-swipe to next day
- Bugifx: Canadian provinces are now searchable
- Ability to upgrade locations database over the internet
- Misc fixes

Integration with calendar
- show any of your calendars above the hours
- easy to avoid conflicts with existing events

Numerous updates to UI
- hours as a unified segment
- bigger fonts, more contrast

iPhone6 and iPad support
- scaling issues are fixed
- works on iPad and in split-view

Integration with calendar
- show any of your calendars above the hours
- easy to avoid conflicts with existing events

Numerous updates to UI
- hours as a unified segment
- bigger fonts, more contrast

iPhone6 and iPad support
- scaling issues are fixed
- works on iPad and in split-view

Added "High contrast" setting that makes font ticker for slightly easier reading (not perfect, but at least something for now)
Fixed issue that resulted in daylines disappearing on occasion
Thank you folks for reporting these issues!

Added "High contrast" setting that makes font ticker for slightly easier reading (not perfect, but at least something for now)
Fixed issue that resulted in daylines disappearing on occasion
Thank you folks for reporting these issues!

Thanks everyone for emailing your feedback and providing details!

- Fixed an elusive crash due to some calendar events
- Fixed a bug that corrupted application state in certain situations
- Added "Zoomed In" setting for bigger tiles.

Thanks everyone for emailing your feedback and providing details!

- Fixed an elusive crash due to some calendar events
- Fixed a bug that corrupted application state in certain situations
- Added "Zoomed In" setting for bigger tiles.

Thanks everyone for emailing your feedback!

- NEW: Widget for the Today screen with basic scheduling
- Fixed blank-screen bug for some situations with calendars
- Changed edit mode button to reduce confusion with location renaming.
- Misc fixes.

Thanks everyone for emailing your feedback!
